column1: | cloud manley rusty winstead jr. passed away on monday
column5: texas. he graduated from weatherford high school and attended weatherford college. rusty was a rancher and a former employee of leonards farm store in fort worth. he was a member of the north main church of christ and a lifelong resident of weatherford. rusty loved people and was a friend to all. he was preceded in death by his parents
column6: seven brothers and two nephews. he is survived by wife
column7: ruth winstead and sister carrie bridges
column9: numerous great and great-great nieces and nephews
column10: and a host of friends. pallbearers will be bob winstead
